title: Family living: who cares?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aging

description: A discussion-provoking film which poses the problems created within a family when an elderly man moves into the home of his daughter, her husband and their two teenage children. Conflict develops between members of the family when their lifestyles clash with that of the grandfather, resulting in his asking the question, "Who cares?".
